Mixtures of different male lure formulations, ME (20% ME, 2% spinosad), ME (20%), TML (10% TML + 5% sugar + 2% spinosad), TA (10% TA + 5% sugar + 2% spinosad), and a combined male lure (CML, 20% ME + 10% TA + 10% TML + 5% sugar + 2% spinosad) were formulated in SPLAT MAT, (SPLAT-Specialized Pheromone and Lure Application Technology, ISCA Technologies, CA, USA) (MAT-male annihilation technique). SPLAT is a commercial slow-release matrix SPLAT and is a modified formulation from Atterholt et al.
26 . SPLAT has been used in pheromone-based technologies (e.g. mating disruption), kairomone-based technologies (e.g. attract and kill, or repellence), as well as sustainable release of semiochemical and control agents in numerous studies, including in the release of male lures for tephritids
27 . The waxes and oils used in SPLAT are biodegradable
26, 27 .
